name: First-Year Pashto I
description: Not open to native speakers of Pashto. Emphasis on basic skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Five lecture hours a week for one semester.

name: First-Year Pashto II
description: Not open to native speakers of Pashto. Continuation of Pashto 506, with emphasis on basic skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Five lecture hours a week for one semester. Prerequisite: Pashto 506 with a grade of at least C.

name: Second-Year Pashto I
description: Not open to native speakers of Pashto. Listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills in Pashto at the second-year level. Three lecture hours a week for one semester. Prerequisite: Pashto 507 with a grade of at least C.

name: Second-Year Pashto II
description: Not open to native speakers of Pashto. Listening, speaking, reading, and writing Pashto at the advanced second-year level. Three lecture hours a week for one semester. Prerequisite: Pashto 312K with a grade of at least C.

name: Readings in Modern Pashto I
description: Readings in expository prose: selections from journals, newspapers, and other sources. Three lecture hours a week for one semester. Prerequisite: Pashto 312L with a grade of at least C.

name: Readings in Modern Pashto II
description: Readings in modern fiction, poetry, and drama. Three lecture hours a week for one semester. Prerequisite: Pashto 320K with a grade of at least C.

name: Topics in Advanced Pashto
description: Fourth-year Pashto readings on special topics. Three lecture hours a week for one semester.  May be repeated for credit when the topics vary. Prerequisite: Pashto 320K and 320L with a grade of at least C in each.
